hotels.title: Lavish India Escape with Oasis-Style Pool & Al Fresco Dining
hotels.description: Discover the buzzing beaches, vibrant nightlife, and mouthwatering cuisines of North Goa with a stay at Holiday Inn Goa Candolim, an IHG Hotel. Set amid lush gardens and nodding palm trees, with a glistening pool at its centre, this lavish oasis offers multiple dining areas, and, of course, a poolside bar. Spend your evenings enjoying tropical cocktails, before heading to Viva restaurant for an al fresco dinner in the Indian breeze.
